login.loginOptions: Why must I login with Facebook?
login.disclaimer: By continuing you indicate that you have read and agree to Simi's
login.sloganMain: A place to ask questions and get answers in real-time

ask.description: Ask anything and Simi will match you with someone who can answer it

placeholder.text: Your knowledge base is empty. Tap below to start adding your areas of interest and expertise.

chat.encryptionDesc: Messages sent or received in this chat are secured with end-to-end encryption, which means thrid parties can't read them.
chat.progressTextOPMajor: Looking for someone you can talk to
chat.progressTextOPMinor: This may take some time so hang tight
chat.endChatDesc: Are you sure? Your connection will be terminated and you will not be able to chat with your partner again.
chat.askAgainDesc: Are you sure? You will be connected to a new partner.
chat.feedbackDesc: How would you rate your partner? Your feedback will help us improve quality.

deck.empty: No new questions. Please try again later.

knowledgeBase.placeholder: Enter one topic at a time
